name.ja: <ruby>転生炎獣<rt>サラマングレイト</rt></ruby>バースト・グリフォン

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
 If this card is Synchro Summoned using "Salamangreat Burst Gryphon" as material: You can activate this effect; during the next Standby Phase, Special Summon 1 monster from your GY. You can target 1 Level 7 or lower FIRE monster in your GY; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except FIRE monsters, also Special Summon that monster, and if you do, reduce this card's Level by that monster's original Level. You can only use each effect of "Salamangreat Burst Gryphon" once per turn.
